title: Who was affected by the stock market crash? - Quora
tags: Stock Market Crashes and Major Drops

response.answer_text: Stock market is a vital part of any countries economy. It's a first and fast reflection of that countries financial health. Banks, other financial institutions such as FIIs, insurance companies, mutual funds, pension funds, bond markets are big investors in the stock market. When stock market crashes it hurts every citizen who invest directly or indirectly.
